attributes.action: restrict newly qualified drivers driving larger vehicles as soon as they have passed their test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Newly qualified drivers should be restricted to say 1300cc motorvehicles once they have passed their tests.  Motorcyclists have restrictions on engine capacity - this should apply to motor cars.  After a year, the learner is re-tested and then a full licence given to drive.  If no incidents occur, then another test be carried out, say a years' time.  If this test is passed, the restriction is then be lifted
